docs.title: Home
docs.text: This is hosted in GitHub Pages. Happy Reading.

docs.title: How To Deploy
docs.text: Only manual deployment is supported. GitHub Pages for private repositories is not available for free tier.

docs.title: 1. Add Remote [Only Once]
docs.text: git remote add docs https://github.com/Solenergy-Systems-Inc/envision-standard-backend-docs.git

docs.title: 2. Deploy
docs.text: mkdocs gh-deploy -r docs

docs.title: BaseAuditDTO
docs.text: This is a parent class for DTOs that contains common audit-related fields.

docs.title: BaseAuditDTO
docs.text:
Attributes:

Name Type Description created_date_utc datetime updated_date_utc datetime

docs.title: [GET] transactionsSummary
docs.text: /api/transactions/summary

docs.title: TransactionsSummaryRequestDTO dataclass
docs.text:
Attributes:

Name Type Description start_date str

start date of the transaction summary in the format of 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS'

end_date str

end date of the transaction summary in the format of 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS'

site_id str

site id of the transaction summary

docs.title: TransactionsSummaryResponseDTO dataclass
docs.text:
Attributes:

Name Type Description statistics dict

statistics of the transaction summary of type TransactionsStatisticsDTO

transactions List[dict]

list of transactions of type TransactionDTO

docs.title: TransactionsSummaryStatisticsDTO dataclass
docs.text:
Attributes:

Name Type Description sessions int

total number of charging sessions

total_demand float

total demand in kWh

total_duration float

total duration in hours

wallet_payments float

total wallet payments in PHP

straight_payments float

total straight payments in PHP

total_payments float

total payments in PHP

docs.title: TransactionDTO dataclass
docs.text:
Attributes:

Name Type Description reference_num str

transaction id

start_date str

start date of the transaction in the format of 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS'

charger_name str

charger used for the tranasction

location str

location of the transaction

demand float

kWh consumed during charging session

driver str

name of the driver

duration float

duration of the charging session in hours

email str

email of the driver

payment_amount float

payment amount in PHP

payment_method str

payment method used

docs.title: [POST] createTicket
docs.text: /api/technicalSupport/createTicket

docs.title: CreateTicketRequestDTO dataclass
docs.text:
Attributes:

Name Type Description title str location_id int

Site ID

details str

docs.title: CreateTicketResponseDTO dataclass
docs.text:
Attributes:

Name Type Description ticket_id int

docs.title: Notes
docs.text: • Uploading of files will be added in the future.

docs.title: [POST] sendTicketReply
docs.text: /api/technicalSupport/sendTicketReply

docs.title: Create an API request with the following body parameters:
SendTicketReplyRequestDTO dataclass
docs.text:
Attributes:

Name Type Description ticket_id str

unique ticket identifier

message str

message to be sent

close_ticket bool

SPECIFY TRUE TO CLOSE TICKET AFTER REPLY

docs.title: The API will return a generic success / fail response where the body will be empty.
ResponseDTO dataclass
docs.text:
Attributes:

Name Type Description statusCode str

HTTP status code

body str

response body

headers dict

response headers

docs.title: [GET] getTickets
docs.text: /api/technicalSupport/getTickets

docs.title: GetTicketsRequestDTO dataclass
docs.text:
Attributes:

Name Type Description status TicketStatusEnum

docs.title: TicketStatusEnum
docs.text: Options Open Closed

docs.title: GetTicketsResponseDTO dataclass
docs.text:
Attributes:

Name Type Description tickets List[Union[SingleTicketInfoDTO, Dict]]

docs.title: SingleTicketInfoDTO dataclass
docs.text:
Attributes:

Name Type Description id int title str

docs.title: [GET] getTicketDetails
docs.text:
/api/technicalSupport/getTicketDetails
Form a request to get ticket messages using the following parameters:

Expect a response with the following parameters:

docs.title: TicketDetailsRequestDTO dataclass
docs.text:
Attributes:

Name Type Description ticket_id str

unique ticket identifier

docs.title: TicketDetailsResponseDTO dataclass
docs.text:
Attributes:

Name Type Description ticket_id int

unique ticket identifier

title str

ticket title

location_id int

Site ID

details str

ticket details

ticket_status str

if the ticket is open or closed

created_date_utc str

ticket creation datetime in the UTC

username str

username of the ticket creator

docs.title: [GET] getTicketMessages
docs.text:
/api/technicalSupport/getTicketMessages
Form a request to get ticket messages using the following parameters:

Expect a response with the following parameters:

Each message inside the messages array will have the following structure:

docs.title: TicketMessagesRequestDTO dataclass
docs.text:
Attributes:

Name Type Description ticket_id str

unique ticket identifier

docs.title: TicketMessagesResponseDTO dataclass
docs.text:
Attributes:

Name Type Description messages [TicketMessageDTO]

List of messages

docs.title: TicketMessageDTO dataclass
docs.text:
Attributes:

Name Type Description message str

message content

created_date_utc str

ticket creation datetime in the UTC

username str

username

docs.title: [POST] sendTicketReply
docs.text:
/api/technicalSupport/sendTicketReply

Form a request to get ticket messages using the following parameters:

Expect a generic success response with the following parameters:

docs.title: SendTicketReplyRequestDTO dataclass
docs.text:
Attributes:

Name Type Description ticket_id str

unique ticket identifier

message str

message to be sent

close_ticket bool

SPECIFY TRUE TO CLOSE TICKET AFTER REPLY

HTTP status code
